ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Ysheka
ygData.msgSnippet: Go to maps.eq-toolbox.com and you can download ingame maps for everquest. I don t know if I ve ever been to broken skull.. I tend to get lost easily even with
ygData.messageBody:
Go to maps.eq-toolbox.com and you can download ingame maps for everquest.
I don't know if I've ever been to broken skull.. I tend to get lost easily
even with maps. Kinda hard to concentrate on just where you're going when
invis wears off and you have a train of mobs on your tail.
Hey, does anyone know if you can search for charm slot only items if you get
a subscription to allakhazam? I want to see what charms are available and so
forth before I combine a charm with my adventurer's stone.
luv,
-Su

> Thanks for the responses. I do plan to go soon. I don't find much info
> on EQ Atlas on Broken Skull. Maps, that's about it. Is it not drawing
> much interest? Do we have too many places to go? Or are they just not
> keeping the site updated?
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
